data.message: Who cares, it's normal in this day an age. Now if I marched saying I'm proud to be a white, straight, christian American male I'd get called a racist. That's what pisses me off.

replies.message: Keith I would never call you racist. You can take pride in everything you do. You should organize a pride group for people to support your cause. Shoot knows you're not in the minority, so you should have plenty who stand behind it.
probably, because comparing being white and christian with being gay/straight/lesbian/transgender is pretty ignorant, pal. Nothing to do with it.
So, basically it would be another day living in South Carolina for me to see you "March".
It is NOT normal NOT ever .....Please remember That !
